articles.description: Leicester City are docked six points by the English Football League for breaching financial rules.
articles.title: Leicester City docked six points by EFL for financial breaches

articles.description: Chelsea boss Liam Rosenior says Arsenal were affecting his side's warm-up prior to the second leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final at Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Arsenal lack of respect in warm-up behind outburst - Chelsea boss Liam Rosenior

articles.description: Aden Durde's journey to Sunday's Super Bowl is not just unusual, it's unique. The Briton's love of the NFL began with a 1986 video cassette - now he is coaching in sport's biggest game.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2026: Aden Durde's incredible journey with Seattle Seahawks to NFL's showpiece game

articles.description: Wales name Louis Rees-Zammit at full-back for the Six Nations opener against England at the Allianz Stadium in Twickenham.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026:  Wales name Louis Rees-Zammit at full-back against England

articles.description: British number one Emma Raducanu storms into the semi-finals of the Transylvania Open with a commanding victory over Poland's Maja Chwalinska.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu storms into Cluj semi-finals with win over Maja Chwalinska, Sonay Kartal beaten

articles.description: Chelsea and Strasbourg have completed 12 transfer deals this summer. Is it out of the ordinary, and might Fifa get involved?
articles.title: Are Chelsea-Strasbourg transfer deals bad for football?

articles.description: Duhan van der Merwe, Darcy Graham and Blair Kinghorn are left out of Scotland's side for the Six Nations opener against Italy.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Scotland drop Van der Merwe, Graham & Kinghorn

articles.description: Italy has foiled "Russian origin" cyber-attacks targeting the Winter Olympics, says Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Italy foils 'Russian cyber-attacks' at Milan-Cortina Games

articles.description: Jon Rahm says a ruling that will see only the top 10 finishers at LIV Golf events awarded world ranking points "doesn't seem fair".
articles.title: Jon Rahm criticises move to limit LIV Golf world ranking points

articles.description: Beset by delays, concerns and last-minute building works, the Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena finally opened its doors to Olympic crowds on Thursday.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Delayed Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena hosts first match
